entry.title: Saturday night: Snow and blowing snow. Low minus 13.
entry.summary: Snow and blowing snow. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind east 30 km/h gusting to 50. Low minus 13. Wind chill minus 26 overnight. Forecast issued 12:11 AM MDT Sunday 9 April 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Blizzard. High minus 11.
entry.summary: Snow. Blizzard developing in the morning. Snowfall amount 2 cm. Wind northeast 50 km/h gusting to 70. High minus 11. Wind chill near minus 27. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 12:11 AM MDT Sunday 9 April 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 21. POP 30%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Wind northeast 50 km/h gusting to 70 diminishing to 30 gusting to 50 in the evening. Low minus 21. Wind chill minus 27 in the evening and minus 34 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 12:11 AM MDT Sunday 9 April 2023
